item.description:
Vie for a chance to pitch your book, possibly winning an introduction to an appropriate agent. Thursday's event is part of the author series at PSB, this one, though, looks like it's more interactive.

Even if you're not interested in pitching your book, come learn tips for how to do it when you are ready.

A purchase is required for a chance to present, otherwise it's free. Come be supportive or be supported by the Meetup writers.

For more info, check out the website: http://www.portersquarebooks.com/event/pitchapalooza-david-sterry-and-arielle-eckstut
item.name: Pitchapalooza at Porter Square Books
